name: root
description: A monorepo for all npm packages in the Tasit ecosystem

scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:3rd-parties && npx lerna clean --yes && rm -rf ./node_modules && npx lerna --scope tasit-contracts exec -- rm -rf ./build
scripts.publish: npm run clean:all && npm run bootstrap && npm test && npm run clean:3rd-parties && npx lerna publish
scripts.ganache:start:ropsten: npx ganache-cli --fork https://ropsten.infura.io/latest --blockTime 0.1 -m 'beach swap combine paper music cook electric bullet trust actress liquid asthma' --gasLimit 1000000000000 --host 0.0.0.0 > /dev/null 2>&1 &
scripts.ganache:start: npx ganache-cli --noVMErrorsOnRPCResponse true -m 'beach swap combine paper music cook electric bullet trust actress liquid asthma' --gasLimit 1000000000 --host 0.0.0.0 > /dev/null 2>&1 &
scripts.ganache:stop: kill `ps ax|grep ganache-cli|grep -v grep| awk '{print $1}'` 2> /dev/null; exit 0
scripts.pretest: npm run ganache:stop && npm run ganache:start && npm run truffle:migrate

author: Tasit Labs
